item.title: Export Certificate and Private key from JKS
item.description: I had to migrate web application written in Java to NodesJS, Java web containers store certificates inside JKS Keystore where NodeJS requires certificate and private key in PEM format. Exporting certificate directly from JKS is easy by using keytool, but exporting private key is not allowed, To export the private key using Java, we need to interact with the keystore by writing some custom code using the Keystore java API,
